item.title: Helping the Poor and Distressed
item.description:
Helping the Poor and Distressed by President Dallin H. Oaks, First Counselor in the First Presidency given in the Saturday Morning session of the 192nd Semiannual General Conference on Fri Sep 30 2022
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone.
